verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Then the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now תִרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> Now shalt thou see אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> what I will do לְפַרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> to Pharaoh כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בְיָ֤ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָה֙ <WH2389> for with a strong יְשַׁלְּחֵ֔ם <WH7971> shall he let them go וּבְיָ֣ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָ֔ה <WH2389> and with a strong יְגָרְשֵׁ֖ם <WH1644> shall he drive them out מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> of his land ס

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> about מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> unto Moses וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto him I [am] the LORD

וָאֵרָ֗א <WH7200> And I appeared אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> unto Abraham אֶל־ <WH413> to יִצְחָ֥ק <WH3327> unto Isaac וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> and unto Jacob בְּאֵ֣ל <WH410> by [the name of] God שַׁדָּ֑י <WH7706> Almighty וּשְׁמִ֣י <WH8034> but by my name יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> JEHOVAH לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not נוֹדַ֖עְתִּי <WH3045> was I not known לָהֶֽם׃

וְגַ֨ם <WH1571> also הֲקִמֹ֤תִי <WH6965> And I have also established אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִי֙ <WH1285> my covenant אִתָּ֔ם <WH854> for לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> with them to give לָהֶ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> them the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> the land מְגֻרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4033> of their pilgrimage אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which גָּ֥רוּ <WH1481> wherein they were strangers בָֽהּ׃

וְגַ֣ם ׀ <WH1571> Furthermore אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <WH8085> And I have also heard אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַאֲקַת֙ <WH5009> the groaning בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> the Egyptians מַעֲבִדִ֣ים <WH5647> keep in bondage אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וָאֶזְכֹּ֖ר <WH2142> and I have remembered אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִֽי׃ <WH1285> my covenant

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Wherefore אֱמֹ֥ר <WH559> say לִבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD וְהוֹצֵאתִ֣י <WH3318> and I will bring אֶתְכֶ֗ם <WH853> מִתַּ֙חַת֙ <WH8478> under סִבְלֹ֣ת <WH5450> you out from under the burdens מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of the Egyptians וְהִצַּלְתִּ֥י <WH5337> and I will rid אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מֵעֲבֹדָתָ֑ם <WH5656> you out of their bondage וְגָאַלְתִּ֤י <WH1350> and I will redeem אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> out arm נְטוּיָ֔ה <WH5186> you with a stretched וּבִשְׁפָטִ֖ים <WH8201> judgments גְּדֹלִֽים׃ <WH1419> and with great

וְלָקַחְתִּ֨י <WH3947> And I will take אֶתְכֶ֥ם <WH853> לִי֙ לְעָ֔ם <WH5971> you to me for a people וְהָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> become לָכֶ֖ם לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> and I will be to you a God וִֽידַעְתֶּ֗ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּ֣י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I am יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God הַמּוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> which bringeth אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under סִבְל֥וֹת <WH5450> you out from under the burdens מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of the Egyptians

וְהֵבֵאתִ֤י <WH935> And I will bring אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> you in unto the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ <WH5375> accept אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֔י <WH3027> able לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> to give אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> it to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> and to Jacob וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> and I will give אֹתָ֥הּ <WH853> לָכֶ֛ם מוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <WH4181> it you for an heritage אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> thus אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> so unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> did not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> but they hearkened אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> not unto Moses מִקֹּ֣צֶר <WH7115> for anguish ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> of spirit וּמֵעֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> bondage קָשָֽׁה׃ <WH7186> and for cruel פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

בֹּ֣א <WH935> Go דַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> in speak אֶל־ <WH413> about פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וִֽישַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> go out אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> that he let the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> of his land

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> Behold the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שָׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> have not hearkened אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me וְאֵיךְ֙ <WH349> how יִשְׁמָעֵ֣נִי <WH8085> hear פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> unto me how then shall Pharaoh וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> me עֲרַ֥ל <WH6189> who [am] of uncircumcised שְׂפָתָֽיִם׃ <WH8193> band פ

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and to אַהֲרֹן֒ <WH175> and unto Aaron וַיְצַוֵּם֙ <WH6680> and gave them a charge אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> and unto Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לְהוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> to bring אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt ס

אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> These [be] the heads בֵית־ <WH1004> houses אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers' בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> The sons רְאוּבֵ֜ן <WH7205> of Reuben בְּכֹ֣ר <WH1060> the firstborn יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel חֲנ֤וֹךְ <WH2585> Hanoch וּפַלּוּא֙ <WH6396> and Pallu חֶצְר֣וֹן <WH2696> Hezron וְכַרְמִ֔י <WH3756> and Carmi אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> these [be] the families רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <WH7205> of Reuben

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons שִׁמְע֗וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon יְמוּאֵ֨ל <WH3223> Jemuel וְיָמִ֤ין <WH3226> and Jamin וְאֹ֙הַד֙ <WH161> and Ohad וְיָכִ֣ין <WH3199> and Jachin וְצֹ֔חַר <WH6714> and Zohar וְשָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> and Shaul בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑ית <WH3669> of a Canaanitish woman אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> these [are] the families שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <WH8095> of Simeon

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁמ֤וֹת <WH8034> And these [are] the names בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the sons לֵוִי֙ <WH3878> of Levi לְתֹ֣לְדֹתָ֔ם <WH8435> according to their generations גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <WH1648> Gershon וּקְהָ֖ת <WH6955> and Kohath וּמְרָרִ֑י <WH4847> and Merari וּשְׁנֵי֙ <WH8141> and the years חַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> of the life לֵוִ֔י <WH3878> of Levi שֶׁ֧בַע <WH7651> and seven וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <WH7970> thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <WH3967> [were] an hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The sons גֵרְשׁ֛וֹן <WH1648> of Gershon לִבְנִ֥י <WH3845> Libni וְשִׁמְעִ֖י <WH8096> and Shimi לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> according to their families

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons קְהָ֔ת <WH6955> of Kohath עַמְרָ֣ם <WH6019> Amram וְיִצְהָ֔ר <WH3324> and Izhar וְחֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> and Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵ֑ל <WH5816> and Uzziel וּשְׁנֵי֙ <WH8141> and the years חַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> of the life קְהָ֔ת <WH6955> of Kohath שָׁלֹ֧שׁ <WH7969> and three וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <WH7970> thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <WH3967> [were] an hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons מְרָרִ֖י <WH4847> of Merari מַחְלִ֣י <WH4249> Mahali וּמוּשִׁ֑י <WH4187> and Mushi אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> these [are] the families הַלֵּוִ֖י <WH3878> of Levi לְתֹלְדֹתָֽם׃ <WH8435> according to their generations

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took עַמְרָ֜ם <WH6019> And Amram אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹכֶ֤בֶד <WH3115> him Jochebed דֹּֽדָתוֹ֙ <WH1733> his father's sister ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> to wife וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and she bare ל֔וֹ אֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> him Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> and Moses וּשְׁנֵי֙ <WH8141> and the years חַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> of the life עַמְרָ֔ם <WH6019> of Amram שֶׁ֧בַע <WH7651> and seven וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <WH7970> and thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <WH3967> [were] an hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons יִצְהָ֑ר <WH3324> of Izhar קֹ֥רַח <WH7141> Korah וָנֶ֖פֶג <WH5298> and Nepheg וְזִכְרִֽי׃ <WH2147> and Zichri
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons עֻזִּיאֵ֑ל <WH5816> of Uzziel מִֽישָׁאֵ֥ל <WH4332> Mishael וְאֶלְצָפָ֖ן <WH469> and Elzaphan וְסִתְרִֽי׃ <WH5644> and Zithri

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> And Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלִישֶׁ֧בַע <WH472> him Elisheba בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter עַמִּינָדָ֛ב <WH5992> of Amminadab אֲח֥וֹת <WH269> sister נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <WH5177> of Naashon ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> to wife וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and she bare ל֗וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> נָדָב֙ <WH5070> him Nadab וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִיה֔וּא <WH30> and Abihu אֶת־ <WH853> אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> Eleazar וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִֽיתָמָֽר׃ <WH385> and Ithamar

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons קֹ֔רַח <WH7141> of Korah אַסִּ֥יר <WH617> Assir וְאֶלְקָנָ֖ה <WH511> and Elkanah וַאֲבִיאָסָ֑ף <WH23> and Abiasaph אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> these [are] the families הַקָּרְחִֽי׃ <WH7145> of the Korhites

וְאֶלְעָזָ֨ר <WH499> And Eleazar בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> son אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> Aaron's לָקַֽח־ <WH3947> took ל֨וֹ מִבְּנ֤וֹת <WH1323> him [one] of the daughters פּֽוּטִיאֵל֙ <WH6317> of Putiel ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> to wife וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> and she bare ל֖וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> פִּֽינְחָ֑ס <WH6372> him Phinehas אֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> These רָאשֵׁ֛י <WH7218> these [are] the heads אֲב֥וֹת <WH1> of the fathers הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> of the Levites לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> according to their families

ה֥וּא <WH1931> These אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> [are] that Aaron וּמֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> and Moses אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to whom אָמַ֤ר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD לָהֶ֔ם הוֹצִ֜יאוּ <WH3318> Bring out אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> from the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עַל־ <WH5921> according צִבְאֹתָֽם׃ <WH6635> according to their armies

הֵ֗ם <WH1992> These הַֽמְדַבְּרִים֙ <WH1696> [are] they which spake אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> to Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לְהוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> to bring out אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> from Egypt ה֥וּא <WH1931> it was מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> these [are] that Moses וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> and Aaron

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> And it came to pass on the day דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> [when] the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> unto Moses בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt פ

וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> That the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD דַּבֵּ֗ר <WH1696> speak אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> thou unto Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I דֹּבֵ֥ר <WH1696> all that I say אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I am עֲרַ֣ל <WH6189> Behold I [am] of uncircumcised שְׂפָתַ֔יִם <WH8193> lips וְאֵ֕יךְ <WH349> how יִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> hearken אֵלַ֖י <WH413> then פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> and how shall Pharaoh פ
